question: People Value the opinions of others and collect information from various sources when considering a major purchase. Which of the following do you think has the greatest impact on their choice what to buy?recommendations from friendsinformation from magazinesreviews from online communities
text: When people want to buy a new thing they collect information from recommendations from their friends or by reading reviews from online websites.In my opinion, there is some reason why I think their friends' recommendations have more impact on their choices.Namely, more trust in friends' opinions , better knowing their taste by close bodies .However, some people have a different point of view that will be discussed in the following essay .

Individuals have a variety of sources to choose a specific thing to buy and friends are the best ones because, initially, more reliable recommendations are given from a close friend , they want to their friend purchase high quality and cheaper stuff , and when they see a shop have a good sales they make aware others . Additionally, when a person knows you for a long time they usually better notice the person's test .For instance, which colours he likes or which material he prefers for clothes. as a result, friends are more dependable sources .

On the other hand, it is believed online reviews are more trustable because , firstly, a lot  of people have experience of using a specific possess and they all share their views on online websites. Thus they provide veracity information for each desire. Secondly, on these websites the negative and positive aspects of using  stuff are discussed and choosing a better one is  easier.

In conclusion, despite the  benefits that friend recommendations have, online reviews though has some advantages . For instance, a variety range of information, and  useful discussions about the benefits and drawbacks of using something .
